llm.intro: Revolutionize natural language understanding and generation with large language models, providing intelligent solutions across various business domains.
llm.service1Desc: Develop high-performance LLMs tailored to enterprise-specific requirements, ensuring optimal performance.
llm.service2Desc: Provide LLM solutions that integrate seamlessly with existing systems to maximize work efficiency and productivity.
llm.service3Desc: Provide LLM fine-tuning and optimization that ensures the highest accuracy and responsiveness in real operating environments.
llm.usecase1Desc: AI-based stock market analysis using quantum trading technology provides the latest investment insights and personalized trading recommendations.
llm.usecase2Desc: AI interview solutions using advanced natural language processing and emotion recognition technology realize objective and fair talent assessment.
llm.usecase3Desc: Provide customized LLM solutions specialized for various collaboration fields. Implement corporate knowledge management, automatic document generation, customer service automation, etc.
llm.usecase4Desc: RAG technology prevents AI model hallucination and ensures accurate and reliable information provision.

cableCar.title: Cable Car Systems
cableCar.intro: Our cable car systems are designed for safety, efficiency, and reliability, providing innovative solutions for urban and recreational transportation.

technology.title: Technology and Solutions
technology.description: We offer a range of cable car technologies, including detachable gondolas, fixed-grip systems, and reversible aerial tramways. Our solutions are tailored to meet the specific needs of each project, ensuring optimal performance and passenger comfort.

urbanTransit.title: Urban Transit System
urbanTransit.description: A cable car system integrated into a city's public transportation network

mountainResort.title: Mountain Resort Gondola
mountainResort.description: A gondola system providing access to a mountain resort

scenicTramway.title: Scenic Aerial Tramway
scenicTramway.description: An aerial tramway offering panoramic views of a scenic area

safety.title: Safety and Operation
safety.description: Our cable car systems adhere to the highest safety standards, incorporating advanced monitoring and control systems. We provide comprehensive training and support to ensure safe and efficient operation.

smartFactory.title: Smart Factory Solutions
smartFactory.intro: Transform your manufacturing processes with AI-powered automation, predictive maintenance, and intelligent quality control systems.

solution1.title: Intelligent Process Optimization
solution1.description: Optimize production workflows with AI-driven insights, reducing bottlenecks and maximizing throughput.

solution2.title: Advanced Quality Control
solution2.description: Enhance product quality with real-time defect detection and analysis using computer vision.

solution3.title: Predictive Maintenance
solution3.description: Minimize downtime and maintenance costs by predicting equipment failures with AI.

story1.title: Automotive Manufacturing
story1.description: Increased production efficiency by 20% and reduced defect rates by 15% with our AI solutions.

story2.title: Electronics Assembly
story2.description: Achieved 99.5% accuracy in quality control and reduced waste by 30% through AI-powered inspection.

story3.title: Food Processing
story3.description: Improved food safety compliance by 40% and optimized supply chain efficiency with our smart factory solutions.

smartFactory.ctaDescription: Ready to take the next step towards a smarter, more efficient factory? Contact us today to learn how our AI solutions can benefit your business.

computerVision.title: Computer Vision Solutions
computerVision.intro: Transform your operations with our cutting-edge computer vision technology. We offer solutions for various industries, including manufacturing, automotive, and transportation.

app1.title: Smart Factory
app1.description: Enhance production efficiency and quality with real-time monitoring and defect detection.

app2.title: Automotive Tuning
app2.description: Optimize vehicle performance and safety through advanced image analysis and control systems.

app3.title: Cable Car Safety
app3.description: Ensure passenger safety and operational reliability with intelligent monitoring and control systems.

project1.title: Smart Factory Implementation
project1.description: A leading manufacturer improved production efficiency by 20% using our computer vision solution.

project2.title: Automotive Performance Tuning
project2.description: A racing team achieved a 15% performance boost with our AI-powered tuning system.

project3.title: Cable Car Safety System
project3.description: A major cable car operator enhanced safety and reliability with our advanced monitoring system.

tech1.title: Industrial Defect Detection
tech1.description: Our advanced computer vision algorithms utilize deep learning models to identify manufacturing defects with unprecedented accuracy. The system processes high-resolution images in real-time, detecting microscopic flaws that traditional inspection methods might miss.

tech2.title: Autonomous Driving Vision
tech2.description: Our computer vision technology enables precise object detection, lane recognition, and traffic sign interpretation for autonomous vehicles. Multi-camera fusion provides 360-degree environmental awareness with advanced depth perception and motion prediction.

tech3.title: Advanced Image Analysis
tech3.description: Leveraging state-of-the-art neural networks including CNN, YOLO, and Transformer architectures, our systems provide comprehensive visual intelligence for industrial automation, security monitoring, and predictive maintenance applications.

carTuning.title: Advanced Car Tuning Solutions
carTuning.description: Transform your vehicle's performance with AI-driven ECU optimization, precision engine mapping, and advanced data analytics. Our cutting-edge tuning solutions deliver measurable power gains while maintaining reliability and emissions compliance.

service1.title: ECU Remapping
service1.description: Advanced engine control unit programming with real-time data analysis. Optimize fuel maps, ignition timing, and boost pressure for maximum performance.

service2.title: Turbo/Supercharger Tuning
service2.description: Precision forced induction optimization. Custom boost maps, wastegate control, and intercooler efficiency enhancement for maximum power delivery.

service3.title: Dyno Testing & Analysis
service3.description: Comprehensive dynamometer testing with real-time telemetry. Air-fuel ratio monitoring, knock detection, and emissions analysis for optimal tuning.

process1.title: Initial Diagnostics
process1.description: Comprehensive vehicle assessment using OBD-II scanning, compression testing, and baseline dyno runs to establish current performance parameters.

process2.title: Custom Mapping
process2.description: AI-assisted ECU calibration with custom fuel and ignition maps tailored to your specific engine configuration and performance goals.

process3.title: Real-Time Optimization
process3.description: Live tuning sessions with continuous monitoring of AFR, knock sensors, and exhaust gas temperatures for safe power optimization.

process4.title: Validation & Testing
process4.description: Final dyno validation with multiple power runs, road testing, and comprehensive data logging to ensure reliability and performance.

performance.disclaimer: *Results may vary depending on vehicle condition and modifications

case1.title: BMW M3 F80 Turbo Optimization
case1.subtitle: High-Performance Sedan
case1.description: Stage 2 ECU tune with custom turbo mapping, optimized fuel delivery, and advanced knock protection. Achieved 510HP total output while maintaining reliability.

case2.title: Audi RS6 Avant ECU Flash
case2.subtitle: Twin-Turbo V8 Wagon
case2.description: Stage 1+ tune optimizing both turbos with enhanced boost control, revised timing maps, and improved throttle response. Total output: 695HP/850Nm.

dyno.title: 4WD Chassis Dynamometer
dyno.description: State-of-the-art dyno capable of measuring up to 1,500HP with real-time data acquisition and environmental simulation.

emissions.title: 5-Gas Emissions Analyzer
emissions.description: Professional emissions testing equipment ensuring compliance with environmental regulations while maximizing performance.

aiEcu.title: AI-Powered ECU Programming
aiEcu.description: Machine learning algorithms analyze engine data to optimize performance maps with precision impossible through traditional methods.

diagnostic.title: Advanced Diagnostic Capabilities
diagnostic.description: Our facility features cutting-edge diagnostic equipment including oscilloscopes, multimeters, pressure transducers, and wide-band O2 sensors for comprehensive engine analysis and optimization.

motorsports.title: Next-Generation Motorsports Technology
motorsports.subtitle: Revolutionizing the Future of Racing
motorsports.intro: Revolutionize your racing performance with cutting-edge sensor technology, AI analysis, and real-time data processing. We analyze every data point from racing vehicles in real-time to provide optimal performance and strategic advantages.

service1.title: 1. Motorsports Big Data Analysis
service1.description: F1-level data collection systems analyze real-time data from over 500 sensors including engine telemetry, suspension dynamics, aerodynamic forces, GPS positioning, and driver biometrics using advanced AI algorithms.
service1.feature1: • Engine Performance: RPM, Torque, Temperature, Power
service1.feature2: • Tire Analysis: Wear, Grip Level, Optimal Pressure
service1.feature3: • Electric Data: Battery Status, Energy Recovery
service1.feature4: • Thermal Management: Cooling Systems, Brake Temperature
service1.feature7: • Driver Analysis: Heart Rate, Reaction Time

service2.title: 2. Custom AI Model Development
service2.description: We develop customized AI models based on individual vehicle characteristics, driver preferences, and track conditions. Our neural networks analyze hundreds of data points to suggest optimal settings and strategies.
service2.feature1: • Driver Profiling: Personal Driving Pattern Analysis
service2.feature3: • Strategy Planning: Tires, Fuel, Pit Stops

service3.title: 3. Real-time Decision Support System
service3.description: Our advanced system provides real-time strategic recommendations during races, analyzing current conditions and predicting optimal timing for pit stops, tire changes, and tactical decisions.

motorsports.ctaDescription: Experience the future of motorsports with our cutting-edge AI technology. Contact us today to see how we can give you the competitive edge.
